title: first mammals appear
text: The first mammals appeared during the Late Triassic period, around 225 million years ago. These early mammals were small, nocturnal creatures that coexisted with dinosaurs.

title: First monkeys appear
text: The first primates, including early monkeys, appeared during the Paleocene epoch, around 65 million years ago, shortly after the extinction of the dinosaurs.

title: First apes appear
text: The first apes appeared during the Miocene epoch, around 23 million years ago. These early apes were the ancestors of modern apes and humans.

title: First hominins appear
text: The first hominins, the group that includes modern humans and our extinct relatives, appeared around 6 to 7 million years ago in Africa.

title: Homo habilis appears
text: Homo habilis, one of the earliest species in the genus Homo, appeared around 2.8 million years ago in Africa.
